head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOULD, MICHAEL TERENCE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOULD, MICHAEL TERENCE

block.p: GOULD-Michael Terence. Of Old Saybrook, CT, and NYC, on August 11, 2000. Son of William J. and the late Marie Flynn Gould. Brother of Catherine Beta, William, Gregory and John Gould. Fiance of Patricia Lynn Ingellis. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Tuesday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, on Wednesday, August 16, at 10 AM.
